t: Health-tech start-up AliveCor poaches an Amazon director to be its new CEO
s: July 24, 2019 - AliveCor, a start-up building smartphone apps and devices that monitor the heart's rhythm, has a new CEO. That's Priya Abani, the general manager and director of Alexa at Amazon. Prior to Amazon, where she worked for over three years on device solutions for the voice solutions, she worked at Intel for almost a decade on the company's platform engineering group.
